item.title: Teleporting not working! help
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

[code]public void TeleTo(String s, int level)
{
teleX = absX;
teleY = absY;
newheightLevel = heightLevel;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
checkwildy();
if(teleblock == false && actionTimer <= 7)
{
if (s == “Varrock”)
{
teleX = 3210;
teleY = 3424;
addSkillXP((20*playerLevel[6]), 6);
newheightLevel = 0;
}

 if (s == "Falador")
 {
    teleX = 2964;
    teleY = 3378;
    addSkillXP((30*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
         
 }

 if (s == "Lumby")
 {
    teleX = 3222;
    teleY = 3218;
    addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

 if (s == "Camelot")
 {
    teleX = 2757;
    teleY = 3477;
   addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

 if (s == "Ardougne")
 {
    teleX = 2662;
    teleY = 3305;
    addSkillXP((120*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
    
 }

 if (s == "Watchtower")
 {
    teleX = 2549;
    teleY = 3113;
    addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
    
 }

 if (s == "Trollheim")
 {
    teleX = 2480;
    teleY = 5174;
    addSkillXP((400*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

 if (s == "Ape")
 {
    teleX = 2761;
    teleY = 2784;
    addSkillXP((400*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 1;
 }
if (s == "Paddewwa"){

    teleX = 3131; 
    teleY = 9912;
    addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

if (s == “Senntisten”){

    teleX = 3312; 
    teleY = 3376;
    addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

if (s == “Kharyrll”){

    teleX = 3493; 
    teleY = 3485;
    addSkillXP((25*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }
if (s == "Lasaar"){

    teleX = 3007; 
    teleY = 3477;
    addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }
if (s == "Carrallangar"){

    teleX = 3161; 
    teleY = 3671;
    addSkillXP((400*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

if (s == “Annakarl”){

    teleX = 3288; 
    teleY = 3886;
    addSkillXP((550*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

if (s == “Ghorrock”){

    teleX = 3091;
    teleY = 3963;
    addSkillXP((650*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

RemoveAllWindows();
closeInterface();
teleport();
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

else if(teleblock == true)
{
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}

updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/code]

public boolean teleport = false; public int teletimer = 8; public int teleX = 0; public int teleY = 0; public int newheightLevel = 0;

public void teleport() { teleport = true; if(ancientstele == true) { setAnimation(1979); teletimer = 7; } else if(ancientstele == false) { setAnimation(714); teletimer = 3; } }

In process add

[code]teletimer -= 1;

if(teleport == true)
{
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
{
if(ancientstele == true && teletimer == 6)
{
stillgfx(392, absY, absX);
} else if (ancientstele == false && teletimer == 2)
{
stillgfx(308, absY, absX);
}
}
}

if(teleport == true && teletimer <= 0)
{
setAnimation(715);
teleportToX = teleX;
teleportToY = teleY;
heightLevel = newheightLevel;
teleport = false;
teleX = 0;
teleY = 0;
newheightLevel = 0;
resetAnimation();
}[/code]

and add these under case 185

[code] case 4140: TeleTo(“Varrock”, 0); ancientstele = false; break;
case 4143: TeleTo(“Lumby”, 45); ancientstele = false; break;
case 4146: TeleTo(“Falador”, 60); ancientstele = false; break;
case 4150: TeleTo(“Camelot”, 70); ancientstele = false; break;
case 6004: TeleTo(“Ardougne”, 78);ancientstele = false; break;
case 6005: TeleTo(“Watchtower”, 80);ancientstele = false; break;
case 29031: TeleTo(“Trollheim”, 90);ancientstele = false; break;
case 72038: TeleTo(“Ape”, 110); ancientstele = false; break;

                case 50235: TeleTo("Paddewwa", 70); ancientstele = true; break;
                case 50245: TeleTo("Senntisten", 80); ancientstele = true; break;
                case 50253: TeleTo("Kharyrll", 90); ancientstele = true; break;
                case 51005: TeleTo("Lassar", 105); ancientstele = true; break;
                case 51013: TeleTo("Dareeyak", 118); ancientstele = true; break;
                case 51023: TeleTo("Carrallangar", 120); ancientstele = true; break;
                case 51031: TeleTo("Annakarl", 125); ancientstele = true; break;
                case 51039: TeleTo("Ghorrock", 130); ancientstele = true; break;

[/code]
